languages.text: "Бесславная участь для арбитра, но... я буду не один. Благодарю вас за Глейто".
"An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."
languages.original_text: "Бесславная участь для арбитра, но... я буду не один. Благодарю вас за Глейто".

traits.locale_text: "An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I won't be alone. Thank you for Glaito."
"An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I won't be alone. Thank you for Glaito."
"An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."
"An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."
"An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."
"An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."

languages.text: "Ein unrühmliches Schicksal für einen Arbitrator, aber ... Ich werde nicht allein sein. Danke für Glaito."
languages.original_text: "An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: "Ein unrühmliches Schicksal für einen Arbitrator, aber ... Ich werde nicht allein sein. Danke für Glaito."

languages.text: « Un sort peu glorieux pour un arbitrator, mais... au moins, je ne serai pas seul. Merci de me laisser Glaito. »
languages.original_text: "An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: « Un sort peu glorieux pour un arbitrator, mais... au moins, je ne serai pas seul. Merci de me laisser Glaito. »

languages.text: “对法务官而言，这算不上光彩的命运，不过……我不是孤身一人。谢谢你让格雷托留在我身边。”
languages.original_text: "An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: “对法务官而言，这算不上光彩的命运，不过……我不是孤身一人。谢谢你让格雷托留在我身边。”

languages.text: «Un destino vergonzoso para un Arbitrator, pero... no estaré solo. Gracias por Glaito».
languages.original_text: "An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: «Un destino vergonzoso para un Arbitrator, pero... no estaré solo. Gracias por Glaito».

languages.text: 「アービトレイターには不名誉な運命ですが…私は一人ではありません。グライトについて感謝します」
languages.original_text: "An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターには不名誉な運命ですが…私は一人ではありません。グライトについて感謝します」

languages.text: "Bir Yargıcı için şereften yoksun bir kader ancak... Yalnız olmayacağım. Glaito'nun yanımda kalmasına müsaade ettiğiniz için teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "An inglorious fate for an Arbitrator, but... I will not be alone. Thank you for Glaito."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Yargıcı için şereften yoksun bir kader ancak... Yalnız olmayacağım. Glaito'nun yanımda kalmasına müsaade ettiğiniz için teşekkür ederim."
